entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening and ending overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
